website_summaries.verdict: An attractive and affordable kayaking shoe that does a lot of things right, although the removable insole may prove irritating.
pros: Sizing for both men and women, with dozens of colors and styles available
Breathable, flexible polyester with a solid gripping sole
Sole is removable for easy washing
cons: Some felt the removable sole fell out too easily or moved around within the shoe too much
Some reports of this shoe not being terribly durable

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet :(
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these out during a 2 day trip to a water park. The quality was good and the tread on the bottom is durable. Unfortunately after just an hour or two I started to knotice that the side we’re getting weak. By the end of the day the fabric on the side had frayed and by the end of day two there were full of holes on the side. I’m disappointed because the quality is exactly what I was looking but they just don’t work with wide feet :/
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like tougher socks
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Fits nicely Easy to put on and take off Stretchable Flexible Removable sole Cons: Material is very thin and does not look durable. This might be fine for water activities without any abrasion, but will become a one time use kinda thing if you plan on using it near hard surfaces. Thin sole Cheap material on the insides
customer_reviews.author: Kwazii

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Ok, here is the thing, it pains me to do this but this is my very first one star review. I purchased water shoes for my whole family bc our feet were getting tore up at our neighborhood pool. I ordered these shoes for my husband and they tore after the second day at the pool. The quality of the material I think is the problem. Compared to the shoes I got and my kids got was much more thin. The soles on these shoes were not thick and the toe part started to fray almost immediately. Unfortunately I would not purchase these shoes again. 😔
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom💙

customer_reviews.title: Saved me on my cruise
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes as they are super thin, can be rolled and are perfectly packable. Knew I was doing some excursions from my cruise, one in Jamaica. The shoes are perfect. Was able to climb the Dunns River Falls in Ochos Rios Jamaica without a problem. Wore off the boat and on excursions through caves and was perfectly fine. Bus stopped at a tourist side attraction for folks to purchase water shoes. not this lady! I came prepared. Would buy a size smaller as they seemed a little bit bigger than I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable water shoes
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable eater shoes I’ve ever owned! They made walking over rocks and shells a breeze. The design makes you feel barefoot while protecting your feet. They also kept sand Out. They are very light weight and come in a reusable waterproof bag. They dried very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: D.Robinson

customer_reviews.title: they fit fine, stayed on (I'm a 9
customer_reviews.text: Wore these all day at Discovery Cove in Orlando... they fit fine, stayed on (I'm a 9.5-10 in regular shoes). They were comfortable to walk around in and protect your feet from whatever may be on the ground. The ONLY negative was that there is a liner inside that is not attached to the sole, and it moved around a bit. I'm not sure if they would be comfortable to wear without that liner, I haven't tried. Honestly not sure when I'll wear them again... but good to have.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Huge shoes, non returnable even though it says they can be!
customer_reviews.text: I’m at 7 women’s. Chose the 6.5-7.5 shoe. They are HUGE. Might be fine if they were just walking on the beach but not great for in water... and I can’t return them because they were delivered on the 1st and the last day to return them was the 31st, as in YESTERDAY. How is that helpful?!
customer_reviews.author: Kda5038

customer_reviews.title: Light, comfortable no slip
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice. You have to consider what you will be using them for. I just needed something to slip on quickly to run errands outside without slipping. They will serve that purpose well. They have a firm grip on tile thus preventing slips and falls. Good for a bug out bag. They store light and well. They appear to be well made and built to last but again depends on usage. They do run a bit small so do consider next size up. They fit comfortably and snugly conforming to the feet. Feels like you are wearing moccasins. Almost a barefoot feel but with protection and grip.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. L

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfy water shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Panama City Beach and these were the perfect water shoes! They fit perfect and kept my feet protected in the sand and water. I’m not a fan of stepping into the ocean and stepping on God knows what so I figured water shoes/socks would be a good option. I even went snorkeling with them because I wasn’t comfortable wearing the flippers in the ocean. They are pretty sturdy and show no signs of wear after 5 days in the water and the bottom seems pretty rugged without being cumbersome. I threw them in washing machine when I got home and air dried them and I’m putting them away until my next water adventure!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy P.

customer_reviews.title: Great, non-slip water shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these!~ They are incredibly comfy, does not slip off in the pool or when swimming in the ocean (we were in Puerto Vallarta and he said he had no problems with slippage or sand getting inside). He also noted that these gripped the bottom of the pool when walking in so that's a great plus! I will be purchasing at least 2 more since he is incredibly picky with water shoes, or shoes in general. He's already requesting a pair for in-home use LOL.
customer_reviews.author: MiLo CoC

customer_reviews.title: they definitely feel like I'm wearing an 8
customer_reviews.text: normally I wear a 7.5 wide in womens. Went up a size ordered the 8.5-9.5. they definitely feel like I'm wearing an 8.5 so i don't know if going up a whole size is needed. However I only went up a half size for my son and they fit very tight. So it really depends. They should definitely do the job for what I need which is one day at a water park. Also ordered the 10-11 for my husband he wears a 10.5 US mens. Looks like they should for him. See pics. Comparison sole to sole With a 8 US women nike flipflop. pic with finger to show how much room is left
customer_reviews.author: Radfam

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoes for SUP boarding!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Water Shoes!! I bought this with uncertainty, I read all the reviews and decided to give them a try. The first thing I did was glue down the insoles with gorilla glue, due to the reviews. I bought these shoes for SUP boarding and they worked great!! So my review is if your looking for inexpensive water shoes for SUP boarding these are it! I bought smalls and my shoe size is normally a 5 and they fit like a glove! Very satisfied and pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: gpc

customer_reviews.title: Fit true to size
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes for snorkeling on rocks. They can be a tiny bit heavy on the feet when swimming but work great walking around with wet feet on rocks or by pool. They can get stinky, like any wet item, but are easily washable. Inside insole comes out. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: These are so comfortable and I even wear them around the house
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the insoles are loose and come out when swimming. need to make sure they're glued in, correctly. These are so comfortable and I even wear them around the house, out to the mailbox. Awesome shoes swim shoes. Up north around Lake Michigan we have pebbles and stones on our beaches, but these shoes .....don't feel a thing. They stretch and don't pinch at all. If you have bunions or arthritis in your toes, these feel wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: J. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: More like a bedroom slipper....
customer_reviews.text: I liked these when I first put them on, but after a few minutes of walking in them I found the light cloth uppers lacked the strength to keep the soles in place. It would be hazard to run in
customer_reviews.author: kevin doyle

customer_reviews.title: Big and wide woman's foot-- fits just fine
customer_reviews.text: I'm a woman's size 10 US or sometimes an 11 because of my wide feet. These slipped on easily and were not to tight on my heel, arches, or toes. They were tight around the shoe's opening but I feel okay with this because that means they won't come flying off in the water while I'm enjoying a day out.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Boykin

customer_reviews.title: I needed them 3 days later so I was comfortable ordering them
customer_reviews.text: I gave these shoes 3 stars for one reason. They were listed as Prime so I ordered them. I needed them 3 days later so I was comfortable ordering them. I should have received them in 2 days. Unfortunately I received them 15 days after I ordered them. Long after I needed them. They seem like great beach shoes. I don’t know though. My beach vacation was two weeks ago. Maybe I’ll get to try them out next year.
customer_reviews.author: GRAINNE SALINO

customer_reviews.title: cute water sock/shoe but bad quality. The insoles come out so easily
customer_reviews.text: cute water sock/shoe but bad quality. The insoles come out so easily, I would be walking and could feel them creep up the side of my ankle, this got annoying to fix all the time. I tossed them after my trip and wont buy again, i suggest you don't either.
customer_reviews.author: Lmboyd86

customer_reviews.title: started falling apart after two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Holes in the bottom of the shoes after 14 days of use. Cool, comfortable design but cheaply/poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Prueter

customer_reviews.title: Don't wear in sand.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted water shoes for my kids for paddle boarding and kayaking. These shoes fit fine but let in and hold tons of sand. We only use these shoes by the beach so the shoes don't work for us. They not only let sand in but trap it in collecting around the base of the sole. The only way to clean out the sand is to take the shoe off and turn it completely inside out using my fingers to pry sand from around the sole. Other water socks I've purchased don't let sand in and if they do it drains out once you're in the water. Sand simply continues to collect in these shoes making it painful to walk.
customer_reviews.author: MN Elephant

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find a size that fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these water shoes for husband for a summer Maine vacation. Here's a 10.5 but these were too small, bought the next size up and they were too large.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for anything but a rough surface
customer_reviews.text: These look cool and you'll get some compliments, but they fall short in that they sole insert comes loose too often and the rubber sole is just not thick enough for any rocky surface. These would be perfect for a smooth sandy beach where you don't have to do a lot of walking. I don't really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BLUE ELEPHANT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit ok however Integrity is not really there for the price the sole immediately came off and the front of the shoe has begun to tear i will post some picture later i do like them but the wont last for more than a two weeks of usage. They are very comfortable if u enjoy walking barefoot fun to walk in they are also ok in the pool but when in the pool the sole pad kept sliding out
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Good for deadlift workouts
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for deadlifting. The seller said that they would not guarantee them as good for that. To deadlift, I took the cushion inserts out. They have been great for deadlifting -- though I found them a little large. I might buy my next ones the next size smaller. They have been good at gripping the ground and not moving. I might not be using them for competition - but they are the best thing I have found for the money for workouts. They are less expensive than deadlift slippers that are of same quality -- and I believe will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Wally s

customer_reviews.title: Not rock-friendly.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like these were made for a beach with soft sand and occasional shells. I use them at my parent’s house on the lake which is 80% large rocks and 20% small rocks. It definitely hurts to step on the rocks despite the hard rubber sole, but I imagine on a beach they’d be perfect. The only other problem I have is that although they fit perfectly when dry, water rushes into the shoes when I swim and feel like they’re going to slip off. Basically, for a family vacation in Florida, these are ideal, but not if there’s anything sharper than a seashell.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Great Swim Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wore these swim shoes for several hours in the water park at Great Wolf Lodge. The quality is great, very comfortable and they held up very well. I normally wear a size 10 in women and bought the XL which is perfect. The only con is that the shoe liner kept shifting because it's not attached to the shoe. More references: By the way, my two daughters were a size 9 and the size L fit them perfectly. My son wears a size 13 wide and the XXL was a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: ChanceLacee

customer_reviews.title: Run small based on US sizing
customer_reviews.text: They should work well for my intended purpose of something to switch into when I'm bicycling. I'm a little disappointed in the size. I ordered based on the recommended sizing for a mens US size 11. When I got the shoes they say that my size 11 transfers to a size 42 euro which is incorrect. That is actually converstion for a womans size 11. They claim eu 42 is a woman's size 12. I should've ordered a size bigger to get a size 45/46 eu. I'd say their EU sizing is accurate, but their US sizing is off. That may explain why some other reviewers have had problems with the shoes splitting at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: jeff starr

customer_reviews.title: Really great water/yoga shoes, best colors-order a size up is a must
customer_reviews.text: These are ultra thin, comfortable, flexible water shoes/Barr/yoga classes. As far as water shoes over rocks during hikes, not sure, thin bottom. But perfect for the water park and stuff like that. The colors this company offers are awesome and the product looks just like you see on the site. You MUST ORDER ONE SIZE UP!. I could have used even two sizes but they may have been a bit big.
customer_reviews.author: Green eggs and ham

customer_reviews.title: I’ve been wearing these in the pool which made my feet feel much better. After a few weeks of wearing them
customer_reviews.text: I spend at least an hour a day in my pebbletech pool which tears up my feet. I’ve been wearing these in the pool which made my feet feel much better. After a few weeks of wearing them, they are beginning to tear apart near the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: keith k

customer_reviews.title: Like the grip of the sole
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair of this type of shoe, different brand, same sole. I wish the sizing could be more exact but they are doable & wouldn't want them bigger if I was on a beach. I like them for house shoes because it's like barefoot but with better than just a sock. I hate wearing out my socks I wear 7.5-8 W, I ordered 6.5-7.5 M & my toes hit the end, same with my other pair that I ordered 6-7 W because there was not a 7-8 available. Great traction! Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: ms k

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and wet.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived wet with a really bad smell. I could see the condensation in the bag before I even opened it. And it's not like it got caught in the rain because the actual Amazon bag it came in was fine wasn't wet at all just these actual shoes and the bag itself is what and they smell really really really bad. I ordered the same brand for my husband and daughter they're supposed to be here I think by tomorrow so I'll see if there's are the same. But as far as the size I need goes I think I'm going to explore different brand if my husband's and daughters come in fine.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: They are very inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: These Barefoot Shoes are PERFECT. I could not be happier. I have Fine Fiber Neuropathy in my feet which is excruciatingly painful. The only form of cardio-exercise I am able to do, is run laps in a pool, underwater. So I run 1 mile a day, (72 laps), in 4ft of water. And I wear my Barefoot Shoes while running. And they are wonderful! I feel absolutely, no pain, whatsoever, in my feet. They fit perfectly. Nice and snug. Do not slip at all. Dry out in no time, and are wonderful in rivers, as well. Over uneven rocks and boulders, pebbles, you name it. I highly recommend these to anyone. They're great!
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel C Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Didn't offer as much protection as a I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Pro- they are quick dry, fit well even on wide feet, work well on most surfaces Con- I wore them when tubing in the river, I could walk on the rocks but it definitely wasn't comfortable. I would recommend buying a pair with thicker soles.
customer_reviews.author: Days inn Rutland

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and color
customer_reviews.text: One of the things that I would hate about watching Mitch Buchannon running on the beach in Baywatch are the goofy looking black aqua socks that he was wearing. However, these actually look cool. Also, each sock has two loops to grab onto making them easier to put on and take off. Unlike flip-flops, these you can walk normally in as well as run in (although I do not recommend running on the pool deck) without slipping on the deck as these have a pretty aggressive sole. I use these to run laps in the pool as my days of running on dry land are over. I have a wide foot but a narrow heel, yet these fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept and the lightness however the differences in the sizes are vast. I wear a 9 women's shoe and purchased accordingly. My toes were too squashed so I returned them and went up a size. The new size runs much larger everywhere--it seems as though it is made for an extra wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: These water shoes are okay in terms of materials and color scheme, but they are not well built or designed for durability and comfort. It will most-likely tear apart from several uses. The shoe bottom is flat and uncomfortable. At least, they do drain and ventilate pretty well. If you are planning to wear them in controlled areas like pools and beach, they are okay. But if you want to use them as outdoor purpose that requires some walking distance or terrains, maybe not great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kim

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight stylish slipper
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very light and flexible. Slip on easily and our fairly stylish. They are more of a sock than a shoe however. I have neuropathy so must wear shoes around the house and in the pool. Something a little heavier in the sole would be better for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Bad cut on the top fabric causes foot to slip
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are actually quite comfortable, but I noticed after a few minutes the pad started to slip in one of the shoes so I readjusted it several times and was so disappointed that I couldn’t get it to stay in place. I had purchased so Sibbas prior to purchasing these shoes and loved them. The soles on both the Sibbas and these shoes are identical but what I did notice on these shoes were that the top fabric appeared to be misshaped causing my foot to slip in them and causing the padding to slip. So disappointing. I guess I should’ve just stuck with another pair of the Sibbas.
customer_reviews.author: C Cummings

customer_reviews.title: High-cut ankle style water shoe
customer_reviews.text: First, these shoes arrived late and I could not take them on the beach trip that I originally ordered them for. I ordered the style that has a slightly higher cut on the ankle. Despite all of the positive reviews on the other styles by this brand, the water shoes I received were poor quality, the sole was very oddly shaped, and had a strong chemicals smell. The odd shape of the sole made them awkward to walk in as the base of the toe area actually protruded inward. I decided to donate them immediately as I knew they would not be used by me in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Sucked! Go with a different brand! They ripped on the 2nd day!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these water shoes thinking they would hold up. Wrong! My shoes had 3 holes on each side the second day I wore them. The grip on them are amazing, didn't slip on the rocks at all. I wore these shoes on the second day & had a hole on top, at then end of the day I ended up with 3holes. I got a pair of these kind of water shoes for my daughter (different brand) & they are amazing. No holes, no slips, great to walk in & comfortable. These were a waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: Denise A.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes so much I have ordered over 6 pairs already (for self and gifts). They are water shoes so there is no arch support. Love the material, and prefer it to material of most water shoes. To be fair, I do NOT use them for water sports. I use them for every day wear. I have high arches and need support, so cannot wear everyday. However, it is important to walk "bare footed" as well. It helps to stretch muscles in feet without actually being bare footed. Super flexible soles so no resistance when stretching. Everyone stops me to ask about them. They say they look more comfortable then the water sport shoes they have.
customer_reviews.author: Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Good value, can protect the feet, comfortable on hot pool concrete or cold mountain/coastal waters.
customer_reviews.text: these water shoes are a good value and give your feat some needed protection and padding. They should fit with a good pair of fins for anyone who wants to scuba dive or snorkel or free dive. There is not a ton of protection or padding however (this can be a good thing too) ... and they can slip on, depending - though they do fit my wide feet well. - note, tested while swimming in a regular pool and climbing/hiking the Dunn's River Water fall (about 900 feet vertical) on the North Coast of Jamaica.
customer_reviews.author: Moe Better 11

customer_reviews.title: I did try them on and they fit perfectly and are comfortable. They have a B on them
customer_reviews.text: Giving four stars because I wont actually get to use them until Jan 2019. I did try them on and they fit perfectly and are comfortable. They have a B on them, which not sure what its for but since it is my initial I feel like they were personalized for me haha!. They are really cute and can't wait to wear them down to walk the beach in Jan and Feb - when Ill be wintering next to the beach vs dealing with the cold in Iowa.
customer_reviews.author: briley

customer_reviews.title: Inside Sole
customer_reviews.text: When the shoes were received, with the inside sole out side of the shoe, it was very difficult to reinsert the soles. After trying for approximately 20 minutes, I surrended. I felt I had no other alternative, but to return them. It was impossbile to try to reinsert the soles. Maybe some one will have better luck than me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of water shoes in general, but I wanted a pair for longer kayaking trips that might require getting in and out of the water and for going to unfamiliar drop in spots (in case of glass or rocks). These are actually really awesome. They are comfortable and don’t rub against the back of my ankle too much. That’s a big pet peeve of mine. So are water shoes that make squeaky noises while walking when wet. Thank goodness these are silent! All in all, a great purchase. Not mad at all. And they are cute too!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave four stars for this product is because when I bought it, I did so looking for a water shoe to go to the beach, however this is an excellent product to be used at places like swimming pool where you don't have any risk of having a sharp object like seashell punctuate you through the fabric on the sides of this product. I do like this product but I decided to use it as sleepers instead of water shoes. During this coming summer, I will probably be wearing it in our backyard. I have decided to buy water shoes with taller soles that extend themselves higher on the sides of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mar de Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this one!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looked super nice/cute online but when I received them they fit but the sole is too narrow and just weird... it moves when you walk and then you are walking on half the sole. Not comfortable at all, I do not have wide or small feet just normal, wear size 7. They didn't work for me I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Water/Beach/River shoes
customer_reviews.text: The last time I was in the river, I was sorry I did not have anything to protect my feet. The rocks were sharp or covered in a slippery mud/moss. After coming home, I immediately ordered these shoes. They feel great. I will probably use them at the beach before I get to use them again at the river. They would make good pool shoes as well. I ordered size 10 for women and they fit as expected--just right. There is an elastic strap to tighten them around your foot to hold securely.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as an around-the-house shoe
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second pair (first lasted about 2 years). I use them around the house. I wanted something lightweight and breathable, and most slippers were way too insulated and hot for me. The soles are durable but flexible enough that I can go outside to grill or run the trash to the curb then come back inside and sit on the couch with them on. My one complaint is that the versions with patterns appeared to be rubber or plastic material that might lend extra support, but in reality, is cheaply "printed" on with very thin material that looks like it's going to wear off quickly. I do love these shoes/slippers but was disappointed with that aspect of them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Millet

customer_reviews.title: Good for light water use or deadlifts at the gym
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a mens 9.5, purchased the 8-9 mens. Ended up with 2 pairs after post office originally delivered to wrong location. Sizing is a little inconsistent. Both soles marked as euro size 41/42. One pair fits comfortably, one fits very snugly. The snug ones I use at the beach if the water is pebbly. The comfortable ones I use at the gym for deadlifts. With my occasional light use like this they should last a while, but I don't imagine they would last long if I was doing a lot of walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Amazon’s Rating Algorithm Hacked Again
customer_reviews.text: This has to be one of those situations where a company pays massive amounts of people to order their product on Amazon, then leave a nice review so that they can show up at the top of searches. Rest assured, you’re getting what you pay for here. The stitching at the heel tore literally the first time I wore them. After a week of minimal use, these shoes were literally ripping apart from the soles. This was a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I thought I already did this, but I don’t mind doing it again. These are great! I’m considering buying a few more pair. I bought them to play with our dog in the rivers and lakes, I wound up wearing them around the house or to play with him outside. These are the most comfortable item I own 💜
customer_reviews.author: Debra Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fits okay, seems like an ok-good quality water shoe
customer_reviews.text: Got these for an upcoming trip to Cancun. They seem sturdy, and a little better quality than the water shoes I’ve seen at walmart. I got size 37/38 since I wear a size 7.5-8. These definitely fit more on the 37 ish end, so hopefully my toes won’t end up hurting or ripping the material. The soles are rubber and give good traction. I’ll update on how they hold up and their actual performance in the water and walking around.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for use as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The overall length is fine, but the sole of the shoes is much too wide. This causes excess sole material on the sides of the feet, as well as an uneven tapering at the toes. Big toe area fits good, but it slowly gets too long as you move to the next toes. Not appealing visually, as the shape is awkward as mentioned before, and the fabric is so light that you can see all of your toe shapes. Would not recommend unless you just need something to cover your feet in the house. Purchased for beach shoes as advertisements intend, and they are unfortunately not manageable in the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Michael

customer_reviews.title: Protects feet looks cool
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 3 pair of these. They work great in the water. My 7 year old is rough on shoes and tore through them in a month (swimming almost daily) but he had fewer blisters and cuts wearing these than being barefoot! My 9 year old is still on his first pair and they still look almost new. My boys enjoy wearing them and like the fun colors. I like that their feet are protected. These shoes dry quickly and take up very little room when storing
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4

customer_reviews.title: Dont order these
customer_reviews.text: So, I went to put on these shoes for the first time today (even though they sent the wrong color). Put one on and it was comfortable. Got to looking and something seemed weird. They sent 2 right foot shoes!! How the frick dies that happen!? So wrong color and 2 right feet! Way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Miller

customer_reviews.title: Size inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered men's 10-11. Left fit was considerably tighter than the right, so I reordered next size up. Those arrived and were much too loose, so reordered men's 10-11. When that third shipment arrived, both left and right fit ok, unlike the first shipment. Insoles are sewn in, so they do not move around as that can be annoying. Other reviews say insoles are removable but the ones sent are not. Would order again, but wish size was more consistent.
customer_reviews.author: lightuhday

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort.
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be great shoes to wear around the house! Fit well and are very comfortable. If I step out into the garage or retrieve something from the cellar, my feet are protected from cold and moisture. The tred/soles provide excellent grip on stairs and all surfaces, helping to avoid slips and falls. I’m sure I will enjoy wearing them outdoors this summer for gardening and walking my dog. I’m delighted with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Wahl

customer_reviews.title: Good travel/lounging shoe, distance walking not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I used this walking around in Fiji during a vacation. Like others have stated this is pretty close to barefoot and no arch support. So if you have any foot issues I would probably rethink buying these types of shoes. I typically wear a US Mens 10.5 so the range I bought was 10-11. My toes were pretty much maxed out for length. I think they tend to run a touch small. With that being said they felt great and take up almost no room for packing. They are a great vacation/lounging shoe, not so much a distance walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe’s
customer_reviews.text: This water shoe fits perfect. I was a little hesitant because I have a wide flat foot and it causes me to be in between sizes. I’m normally a 9-9.5. The description of the shoes are pretty accurate. It’s not tight on my foot. These are pretty flat so if you are looking for something with arch support you probably won’t get that. These shoes seem to have a good rubber sole on them which is a plus. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Fit just right as expected. Super cute and looked just the picture! Stayed in while kayaking and swimming in the water. Very lightweight but still able to provide protection from the ground. Easy to wash through the washing machine and I air dried them. The one downside is they trap sand and I tried shaking them out but most of the sand still got in my washing machine and still some in the shoes. But, I still would 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great for Working out
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a water sock with tread and a strap across the top. I use them when I travel for business. I used to try to squeeze my running shoes into the overnight bag and it was always a struggle. With these babies, they fit anywhere and I can slip them on and get into the gym no problem. Realize they will not have support, but I prefer to workout barefooted so they are great.
customer_reviews.author: shop23

customer_reviews.title: HOLDS UP TO LAVA
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to Hawaii. These felt great and worked perfectly - held up to lava rock and broken coral and protected from broiling sidewalks. Sand rinsed off easy. Drip dried overnight. My Octo-patterned pair were good quality. But, from the packaging of several pairs of kids and adult sizes orderd from Amazon, it's obvious that this type of water shoe comes from multiple manufacturers, so that might account for the reports of variable quality. One of the insoles came out of my kid's pair, but it was from a different manufacturer - and it slipped right back in and was just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nice snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for paddle boarding. Do not expect to be ok walking great distances, they’re thin, they’re supposed to be. Getting in and out of the lake, I haven’t had problems with rocks but some in the parking lot were rough to step on. I thought the plastic in center would rub and bother me but it actually doesn’t. After a week of using, they’ve held up just fine for my short walk to/from car and time spent in water and on my board.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Joy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are good looking and I get compliments when I wear them out! However I wear a size 8 and these were large. I will order a smaller size next time. The inside soles move around so I took them out. With them being large and rubbing I got a blister on my heal from walking in them. Stayed on in the pool and the color hasn’t faded. Great price for this product but I will try the size smaller next time.
customer_reviews.author: holldoll

customer_reviews.title: Feels like walking barefoot
customer_reviews.text: The product name says it all "Barefoot"; you will feel every pebble you step on. I bough it for a vacation I went on some time ago, walking in the actual beach they felt great, only issue was when I was walking on a side walk and then a rocky path. Decided to give the product 5 stars since it did what it was suppose to do, but just know that if you are looking for something that could be used in both the beach setting and for walking in town, this is probably not the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Junior F. Espino

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality water shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoes. I got them to cover my feet while i’m gardening. It always seems to be wet when I start working, and I wanted something that dries quickly and can easily be cleaned. These are perfect. The fact that they don’t have great support isn’t really a negative. They are only water shoes. You shouldn’t be surprised. However, the sole is actually thicker than I expected, and even has grippers for traction.
customer_reviews.author: Reser

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lake shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because the shoreline at the lake i visit is slate... which can, if not careful, slice your foot right open. Wore these this past weekend and had no problem walking down the bank, on the dock around the boat and even wore them up at the cabin and walking up the gravel road. Perfect, super bright, so no easy to misplace and don't take up a lot of space when packing :) Going to buy some for the rest of my family as well.
customer_reviews.author: KellyMcM

customer_reviews.title: ordered more for family members
customer_reviews.text: I searched for "hot sand shoes" and found these. Last year, the sans was so hot in NC that we ended up wearing the cover from our umbrellas as covers to protect our feet from burning. These shoes were so much better! They stayed in the water, protected from the burn of the hot sand and also from the heat of the concrete around the pool. I am very glad I found these and ordered more while we were on vacation once other family members saw how well they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Sriley721

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I think they are a good deal for what I paid (they were on sale). Had I paid more I think three stars. The sizing was accurate and while they don't feel like a solid shoe I used them to take out the trash and light duty stuff around the house. I kind of want to treat them as a Crocs replacement. I know they are water shoes and one day they will be in the water but until then I will continue testing them for casual activities, who knows maybe even grocery shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for a little over a year and they've held up well! I wore them many hours while hiking/swimming in cenotes and they have no signs of wear. Great product! I bought a size up because I knew I wouldn't have time to return them before my trip and I was i just stuck with my true size. They aren't the absolute most comfortable, but I don't know that this style really can be and still be good in the water. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I dont expect these to last years because the sole is very thin. For now these are comfortable and light. The soles are very thin and off no support at all. They dry quickly. For the low cost if they last a year im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amber D. Waite

customer_reviews.title: Barefoot Fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a great pair of water shoes for the water park and beach for those days where the cement is too hot to walk on and avoiding the nasty foot funguses that are out there. I found them!! They are lightweight, fit great and I cannot wait to wear them this summer or at the rec center pool! I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: LisaG

customer_reviews.title: Not durable Insoles are all crumpled and wrong size
customer_reviews.text: They are cheap, which is about what I expected and would have been ok with. The insoles though, and especially the one in the right shoe, are so folded up and crumpled that the shoes are unwearable. When I tried to iron them out, they are too large for the shoe and so crumpled up again. Update. I wore them for a week without the sole and the seams came loose and the sole started ripping off. Overall garbage
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey De Dios

customer_reviews.title: Color in photo not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in what appears to be lt blue when arrived its more green or greenish turquoise color i thought they shipped wrong one did a return n had send another, well recieved same color back so picture is misleading as far as color, im keeping them cause their pretty cool for beach or pool i also previously ordered yhe neon green shoes n they look good, all in all recommend product. Just waiting for pair i returned to process.
customer_reviews.author: BATMAN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: They are a great fit. It kind of feels like wearing a pair of socks. I live in Texas where the lakes are more mud than rock so was always losing a water shoe to the suction. I've now worn these twice and they stay put. No little rocks get in. No lost shoe to the mud. I like them so much I got ones for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: they'll be perfect! Good value
customer_reviews.text: If you need a cheap pair of water shoes, these are the ones. They will not last you for months if you wear them all day, every day, but for vacations, or trips to waterparks, they'll be perfect! Good value!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Size down if your size isn’t shown
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 8 & that size really isn’t an option. I decided to order a size up and they feel to big. I had ordered a some for my daughter (Med) bc she’s a size 7. I tried hers on and they feel so much better so if you are usually an 8 like me. I’d suggest a size down (6.5-7.5). My foot is average not thin or fat just medium ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Bandw

customer_reviews.title: For decorative purposes only
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to participate in water activities a water park. Example, swimming in a lazy river, riding the wave pool, etc. Since my purchase I may have used them 6 times and now the fabric has started to fray and there is a hole at the toe area. Not as sturdy as I thought they would be. This product is probably more for decorative purposes and maybe to be used for watering your yard. Definitely not to be used at water parks or beaches.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water activities!
customer_reviews.text: I wore these tubing this past weekend and they were the perfect water shoes! They were snug when I put them on at first (not in the water) but they loosened up while I walked around to a perfect fit quickly. When I wore them while tubing they were lightweight, easy to swim in, and offered total protection against sharp rocks. I would say they are true to size- I wear a 9 in closed toe shoes and I ordered the 8.5-9.5. I'm so glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Wynd

customer_reviews.title: Ninja/Shinobi shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable looking Ninja/Shinobi shoes. I use them for yoga and walking around the house. Good price, good fit and nice texture.
customer_reviews.author: Shooter McShooter

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, low quality
customer_reviews.text: Good: The loop on the back of the shoe offers a handy grip when putting on shoes. Disappointed: 3 issues with the water sports shoes/aqua socks: 1) Ordered size 6.5-7.5 for my 6.5 size foot, length was too short. 2) Excess fabric bunched up and sewn into toe area on one shoe, made it unwearable. 3) Shoe fits loosely over the top of foot, not snug as is shown in photos of product. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mountaineer

customer_reviews.title: It takes forever to dry
customer_reviews.text: So I liked it a lot on the beach because I didn’t have to get stabbed in lil shells or rocks. The bottom part of the shoes seem durable for the few hours I had used it. Was alright on land but best in water. But I had attempted to air dry it for 3 days and it still feels damp or soaked in diff parts. This was after squeezing all the water and drying in diff positions. Maybe I’m supposed to tumble dry in dryer but the way this shoe was marketed as quick dry seems to be far fetched. Also the sides of the shoes were awk for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaye Chan

customer_reviews.title: I Love Them
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a trip to DR. Not not only did they hold-up well in the sand and ocean, but I have also worn them as “shoes” at Six Flags. They are very comfortable, and I love the way they hug my feet, which are very narrow. The only time I felt any terrain under my feet was when I walked on gravel in the Six Flags parking lot. Otherwise, they are great, and not too tight. I usually wear a 8.5, so I purchased the 8.5-9.5.
customer_reviews.author: Way

customer_reviews.title: Good for cyclists
customer_reviews.text: I have a 11.5 men's size and the largest size is a bit tight. That may be good for going into the pool -- which I have not done, yet -- but I like going around the house with these. They are less likely to slip than wearing socks and less likely to come off, such as a slipper would. One of the uses that I really like is sticking them in my cycling bag and wearing them when I need to go indoors during a ride. These shoes are so thin and light that having them around, just in case, is worth the effort. If these shoes were just a bit longer, I would give them five stars.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, but sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: They are what I wanted, but the sizing is off. I'm a men's 10-1/2 , so I bought the 10-11 men's size. However, once I put one on, it was obviously undersized. I checked to make certain I was sent what I ordered, and I was. SO, I have to return these for the next size up, if available. Not sure if it is. Be careful when ordering these. A 10-11 is actually more of just a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bolster

customer_reviews.title: Stick to your size
customer_reviews.text: So I've read many review prior to purchasing these water shoes. A lot of people were suggesting to purchase a size up. I listened. I could of ordered my nice and been just fine. I wear a size 8.5 stalletos and tennis shoes. My feet as slim. I got a size larger. I deffinetly have half-of-inch room, and some wiggle room. See pics. I wonder when I'm in the water and the fabric is wet, how much loose and uncomfortable they will be. I guess we will see this weekend! I gave it five stars because it's not the products fault for me ordering a size too large. Otherwise, I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Ella B

customer_reviews.title: Nice match for Spiderman Homecoming cosplay.
customer_reviews.text: The Barerun Kids Aqua Shoes Breathable Slip-ons are just like what you see i the picture. I bought the red to go with my son's Spiderman Homecoming costume and they match perfectly with the Peter Shilton - 1 Pack Youth / Mens Knee High Ribbed Soccer Hockey Sport Socks sold by socksnob_uk. I have a pair of Fit Kicks and these are comparable in the sole and the material. Lets hope they hold out as we have not worn them yet he is saving them for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Great barefoot shoes, but the size runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of these shoes as part of my natural movement efforts, and they fit the bill as far as minimalist barefoot shoes and are a great value. That said, the sizing seems to run a little small, but these just fit me, so I am pleased. *Note that these shoes are completely not waterproof, so if you walk outside with any moisture on the ground, your feet will get wet.* I would buy them again if I need to replace the ones I have.
customer_reviews.author: dlhitzeman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Yoga!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Yoga because the socks do not help me stay put whatsoever. These work perfectly. They provide me support to stay in my positions without sliding and are flexible enough to not hinder my movement. I would highly recommend these shoes to anyone needing a little help not sliding out of a warrior two or extended side angle pose!
customer_reviews.author: B. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Light weight must have!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them! He doea not care for the standard aqua shoes as he says they are too bulky anand make it hard to swim. He said these feel like socks with grip. Just enough protection to keep his feet protected but not to impair his swimming. He said a must have the next time we to to a waterpark. He uses them daily in our pool and they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color & a tad too small
customer_reviews.text: Seller sent me the wrong color in blue firefly when I ordered the yellow firefly. Which is too bad because I needed these the day after they arrived. Will not purchase another pair as they will arrive too late. I normally wear an 8 in shoes and the 8.5-9.5 in women's felt really small and my toes were almost cramped. I do like that they were lightweight and felt like a sock.
customer_reviews.author: MissMac

customer_reviews.title: Wore a hole in them the first use
customer_reviews.text: They went into the garbage after the first day - my son's big poked through both shoes after only 3 hours at the water park. Utter garbage, and ended up spending another $25 on a different pair. Save yourself the money and don't order these!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit well, are super comfy, and provide the support I need while walking on the beach. They’re great to wear while walking on any ground that’s uncomfortable without shoes. I even wore them to the grocery store for a quick shopping trip and they held up great! I recommend looking at the size chart and measuring your feet before buying so that you get the best size for your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith R.

customer_reviews.title: trashed after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Last year's water socks lasted a full season at the beach, pools, etc. This year lasted 3 HOURS TOTAL at the SAME pools on the SAME kid. They weren't too small, yet there are now holes in the toes where his feet peek through. Complete waste of $15. Go with a more expensive/longer lasting brand, these are worse than the ones at the beach dollar stores.
customer_reviews.author: A Grant

customer_reviews.title: Just for fun
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Fits as expected. Used them on my cruise for water excursions on the islands. So worth it. Added to review: size scale quite is accurate. It lists size range for Men and Women under each size (Sm, Med, Lg etc). I got a large. I wear 8.5 in women’s. I had a little extra room in the shoe which I expected. the fabric clung to my feet comfortably without coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D

customer_reviews.title: Great for Pool Walking
customer_reviews.text: Used these in my 24' round above ground swimming pool. I walk around for 1 hr in my bare feet. Sometimes when walking against the current, my feet slip and slide. These shoes have a rubber grip sole. I walked as usual and never slipped once. They fit well and wer comfortble while walking. Well made and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Polite and Kind

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe, but sizes run way big
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome but the size is waay off. They grip really nice and the fabric is super soft. I wear normally a US Mens 10.5 - 11. I got the XXL which is supposed to be for 10-11M, but these are way too big. If I have my heel to the back there is over an inch that can fold up over my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Serianni

customer_reviews.title: If your between sizes go up...
customer_reviews.text: Husband wears a 13 so that’s the size I ordered. They fit a little small once he got them on but he did have a little trouble actually getting them on. He ended up ripping off the pull tab on the front of the shoe putting them on the first time but they serve their purpose. If your between sizes I would recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: Casondra

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: I am shoe size 11, and this fits quite well. The sole is tough but flexible. The upper if fully pliant and flexible but still strong enough to last well. I have some unusual foot problems that require me to have foot protection while walking indoors, but I need to allow my feet to flex freely as well. This shoe allows for both. And, it's light and pliable enough to fold up and stuff into a pocket. Quality seems to be quite high.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

product_meta.title: Barerun Barefoot Quick-Dry Water Sports Shoes Aqua Socks for Swim Beach Pool Surf Yoga for Women Men
feature_bullets: Hight Quality Upper: Breathable and smooth fabrics with fine stretch on uppers. Like socks, flexible and comfortable
Thick Soles: Wearable and top-quality rubber sole, which protects your feet from being hurt by sharp objects when in water
Convenience: It is convenient to wear and take off.After using,you can fold it easily
Various Size Available: Some are designing multiple versions to fit different feet.Men and women size are available.Enjoy the cute and cool water shoes!

OCCASION: Beach, swimming, pool, weight training, wake-boarding, sailing, boating, kayaking, windsurfing, cycling, jogging, walking, fishing, beach volleyball, gardening, lawn, car-washing and driving. Especially for family outings!
